name: genic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving or relating to genes (= parts of the DNA in cells received by each animal or plant from its parents): The authors resort to a traditional approach in order to make their genic models work. In heterogeneous populations, genic actions and interactions are so complex that it is hard to make definitive statements about them.
More examplesFewer examplesThe total genic diversity in a population like this is predictable.We detected one or more rare genic variations in 10% of affected individuals.
